articles.title: M3/Pro MacBook Pro Black Friday deals start from $1,449 on 14- and 16-inch models - 9to5Toys
articles.description: Early Black Friday deals have arrived on Apple's new M3 MacBook Pro. Pricing starts at $1,449, with both 14- and 16-inch configurations.
